ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Horn?
ygData.msgSnippet: The broken mino horn appears to be about 10% improvement. This is purely empirical data, I haven t tested much, but it is definitely less than a regular mino
ygData.messageBody:
The broken mino horn appears to be about 10% improvement. This is purely
empirical data, I haven't tested much, but it is definitely less than a
regular mino horn. (guess it makes sense since it's broken) It is used for
the Shadow Knight Bracer quest. I like it since it's magic and no drop.

Draelon Stormsong

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Monday, July 31, 2000 8:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Horn?


any idea what the broken minotaur lord horn is for in steamfont? i got one
other night...

its lore and no drop

-Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 7:29 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Magical Horn?


Question... How are you able to judge +15% on Wind instruments? I've been
wondering that for a while ;o)

-=B=-
----- Original Message -----
From: Reeves, Patrick W <pwr3@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 9:04 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Horn?


> The mino horn is a wind instrument and adds 15% over a regular wind
> instrument to wind songs.
>
> go here: http://eqsongs.com/Instruments.htm for a full list of known
> instruments.
>
> Rokenn
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Qaelan [mailto:qaelan@...]

> > benefits to songs when used... While fighting in steamfont,
> > we killed a slaver while looking for a minotaur axe. The
> > slaver had a minotaur horn which it says a bard can use... my
> > question is does this horn have any magical song effect to
> > it? ie does it make songs better, or is it just a normal
> > horn... Also, does anyone know what skill this uses, brass or
> > wind, or something else?
> >
> > Thanks in advance for your help
> >
> > Rueveyan
